short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds additional features to your Smartcat account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The initial version allows translators to see the number of words they’re left to translate from all customers. Make sure to open the extension from within your personal account on the required server: EU, US, or EA.
